purpose: The email announces the 29th ETAPS International Joint Conferences on Theory and Practice of Software, scheduled for April 11-16, 2026, in Torino, Italy. It provides details about the conference, including submission deadlines, publication information, and the types of contributions solicited. The email emphasizes the significance of ETAPS as a leading forum for software science research and outlines the new features for the 2026 event.
evidence_sentences: 29th ETAPS International Joint Conferences On Theory and Practice of Software ETAPS 2026 Torino, Italy, April 11-16, 2026
ETAPS is one of the world's leading fora for research on software science, with a history of more than 25 years.
Submission deadlines are strict and firm, no exceptions will be granted.
The proceedings will be published in the Advanced Research in Computing and Software Science (ARCoSS) subline of Springer's LNCS series.
Several satellite workshops and other events will take place during the weekend before the main conferences.
